title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 366/89 of 14 February 1989 fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1989 accounting year of the farm accountancy data network
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 366/89
of 14 February 1989
fixing the standard fee per farm return for the 1989 accounting year of the farm accountancy data network
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The standard fee paid by the Commission to Member States for each duly completed farm return is hereby fixed at ECU 95 for the 1989 accounting year.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply for the 1989 accounting year.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 14 February 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No 109, 23. 6. 1965, p. 1859/65.
(2) OJ No L 348, 24. 12. 1985, p. 4.
(3) OJ No L 190, 14. 7. 1983, p. 25.
(4) OJ No L 11, 15. 1. 1988, p. 36.
